verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, KCl and Arg induced strong and equivalent insulin secretion by islets co-cultured with ADMSCs and ADMSCs-BET; however, the insulin levels in the ADMSCs-BET + islet group were significantly higher than those in the ADMSCs + islet group and islet alone group at 20 and 50 min (P < 0.001).
evidence: KCl and Arg induced strong and equivalent insulin
